Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama | Family
Status: Returning Series
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)

Vera is a crime drama series starring Brenda Blethyn as DCI Vera Stanhope, who attempts to track down different killers with the help of DS Joe Ashworth.
